name: トロピウス
description: It lives in tropical jungles. The bunch of fruit around its neck is delicious. The fruit grows twice a year.

name: リーフィア
description: When you see Leafeon asleep in a patch of sunshine, you’ll know it is using photosynthesis to produce clean air.
move1description: This attack does 20 more damage for each[G]Energy attached to this Pokémon.

name: アマカジ
description: Its sweat is sweet, like syrup made from boiled-down fruit. Because of this, Bounsweet was highly valued in the past, when sweeteners were scarce.

name: アママイコ
description: Steenee spreads a sweet scent that makes others feel invigorated. This same scent is popular for antiperspirants.

name: アマージョ
description: This Pokémon is proud and aggressive. However, it is said that a Tsareena will instantly become calm if someone touches the crown on its calyx.
move1description: Your opponent reveals a random card from their hand and shuffles it into their deck.

name: カジッチュ
description: It grows by eating the flesh of an apple. Applin uses its own body fluid to strengthen the apple’s skin and prevent it from rotting.

name: タルップル
description: It feeds mainly on sweet apples. It will also eat small bug Pokémon that are attracted by its sweet nectar.
move1description: If 1 of your Pokémon used Sweets Relay during your last turn, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: ブースター
description: Inhaled air is carried to its flame sac, heated, and exhaled as fire that reaches over 3,000 degrees Fahrenheit.
move1description: Take a[R]Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

name: ブースター ex
abilityDescription: Once during your turn, you may attach a[R]Energy from your discard pile to this Pokémon. If you do, do 20 damage to this Pokémon.
move1description: Discard 2[R]Energy from this Pokémon.

name: コータス
description: It burns coal inside its shell for energy. It blows out black soot if it is endangered.
move1description: Discard a[R]Energy from this Pokémon.

name: ニャビー
description: If you try too hard to get close to it, it won’t open up to you. Even if you do grow close, giving it too much affection is still a no-no.

name: ニャヒート
description: Torracat will let its Trainer coddle it once they’ve grown close, but it’s a powerful, sharp-clawed Pokémon, so its Trainer gets covered in scratches.

name: ガオガエン
description: Although it’s rough mannered and egotistical, it finds beating down unworthy opponents boring. It gets motivated for stronger opponents.
move1description: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 100 damage for each heads.

name: ヤトウモリ
description: It taunts its prey and lures them into narrow, rocky areas where it then sprays them with toxic gas to make them dizzy and take them down.
move1description: Discard a[R]Energy from this Pokémon.

name: エンニュート
description: Salazzle makes its opponents light-headed with poisonous gas, then captivates them with alluring movements to turn them into loyal servants.

name: シャワーズ
description: It lives close to water. Its long tail is ridged with a fin, which is often mistaken for a mermaid’s.
move1description: Flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, discard a random Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: グレイシア
description: It can control its body temperature at will. This enables it to freeze the moisture in the atmosphere, creating flurries of diamond dust.
move1description: This attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

name: バニプッチ
description: Unable to survive in hot areas, it makes itself comfortable by breathing out air cold enough to cause snow. It burrows into the snow to sleep.
move1description: If 1 of your Pokémon used Sweets Relay during your last turn, this attack does 20 more damage.

name: バニリッチ
description: By drinking pure water, it grows its icy body. This Pokémon can be hard to find on days with warm, sunny weather.
move1description: If 1 of your Pokémon used Sweets Relay during your last turn, this attack does 20 more damage.

name: バイバニラ
description: When its anger reaches a breaking point, this Pokémon unleashes a fierce blizzard that freezes every creature around it, be they friend or foe.
move1description: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 80 damage for each heads.

name: ママンボウ
description: It gently holds injured and weak Pokémon in its fins. Its special membrane heals their wounds.
move1description: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

name: アシマリ
description: The balloons it inflates with its nose grow larger and larger as it practices day by day.

name: オシャマリ
description: It gets excited when it sees a dance it doesn’t know. This hard worker practices diligently until it can learn that dance.

name: アシレーヌ ex
move1description: If this Pokémon has at least 1 extra[W]Energy attached, this attack does 40 more damage.

name: サンダース
description: It concentrates the weak electric charges emitted by its cells and launches wicked lightning bolts.
move1description: If this Pokémon evolved during this turn, this attack does 20 more damage.

name: バチュル
description: Joltik can be found clinging to other Pokémon. It’s soaking up static electricity because it can’t produce a charge on its own.
move1description: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

name: デンチュラ
description: It launches electrified fur from its abdomen as its means of attack. Opponents hit by the fur could be in for three full days and nights of paralysis.
move1description: Discard all Energy attached to this Pokémon. Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

name: エーフィ
description: The tip of its forked tail quivers when it is predicting its opponent’s next move.
move1description: This attack does 20 damage for each Energy attached to all of your opponent's Pokémon.

name: コロモリ
description: While inside a cave, if you look up and see lots of heart-shaped marks lining the walls, it’s evidence that Woobat live there.

name: ココロモリ
description: Emitting powerful sound waves tires it out. Afterward, it won’t be able to fly for a little while.

name: ペロッパフ
description: It eats its own weight in sugar every day. If it doesn’t get enough sugar, it becomes incredibly grumpy.
move1description: If 1 of your Pokémon used Sweets Relay during your last turn, this attack does 20 more damage.

name: ペロリーム
description: By taking in a person’s scent, it can sniff out their mental and physical condition. It’s hoped that this skill will have many medical applications.
move1description: If 1 of your Pokémon used Sweets Relay during your last turn, this attack does 60 more damage.

name: ニンフィア
description: This Pokémon uses its ribbonlike feelers to send a soothing aura into its opponents, erasing their hostility.
move1description: This attack does 30 more damage for each Evolution Pokémon on your Bench.

name: ニンフィア ex
abilityDescription: Once during your turn, when you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may draw 2 cards.

name: ミミッキュ
description: This Pokémon lives in dark places untouched by sunlight. When it appears before humans, it hides itself under a cloth that resembles a Pikachu.
move1description: Flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 of your opponent's Active Pokémon's attacks and use it as this attack.

name: マホミル
description: This Pokémon was born from sweet-smelling particles in the air. Its body is made of cream.
move1description: If 1 of your Pokémon used Sweets Relay during your last turn, this attack does 20 more damage.

name: マホイップ
description: When it trusts a Trainer, it will treat them to berries it’s decorated with cream.
move1description: This attack does 40 damage for each time your Pokémon used Sweets Relay during this game.

name: ドジョッチ
description: Its two whiskers provide a sensitive radar. Even in muddy waters, it can detect its prey’s location.

name: ナマズン
description: It is extremely protective of its territory. If any foe approaches, it attacks using vicious tremors.
move1description: This attack also does 10 damage to each of your Benched Pokémon.

name: コジョフー
description: In one minute, a well-trained Mienfoo can chop with its arms more than 100 times.
move1description: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: コジョンド
description: When Mienshao comes across a truly challenging opponent, it will lighten itself by biting off the fur on its arms.

name: メレシー
description: When beset by attackers, Carbink wipes them all out by firing high-energy beams from the gems embedded in its body.
move1description: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage from—and effects of—attacks done to this Pokémon.

name: ブラッキー
description: When exposed to the moon’s aura, the rings on its body glow faintly and it gains a mysterious power.
move1description: If the Defending Pokémon is a Basic Pokémon, it can't attack during your opponent's next turn.

name: ヤミラミ
description: Materials from gems it has eaten float to the surface of its body and can form an infinite number of patterns among individuals.

name: チョロネコ
description: Opponents that get drawn in by its adorable behavior come away with stinging scratches from its claws and stinging pride from its laughter.
move1description: Discard all Pokémon Tools from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: レパルダス
description: Don’t be fooled by its gorgeous fur and elegant figure. This is a moody and vicious Pokémon.

name: クチート
description: It uses its docile-looking face to lull foes into complacency, then bites with its huge, relentless jaws.
move1description: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

name: トゲデマル
description: With the long hairs on its back, this Pokémon takes in electricity from other electric Pokémon. It stores what it absorbs in an electric sac.
move1description: During your opponent's next turn, if this Pokémon is damaged by an attack, do 30 damage to the Attacking Pokémon.

name: メルタン
description: It dissolves and eats metal. Circulating liquid metal within its body is how it generates energy.

name: メルメタル
description: At the end of its life-span, Melmetal will rust and fall apart. The small shards left behind will eventually be reborn as Meltan.

name: ミニリュウ
description: It sheds many layers of skin as it grows larger. During this process, it is protected by a rapid waterfall.

name: ハクリュー
description: They say that if it emits an aura from its whole body, the weather will begin to change instantly.

name: カイリュー ex
move1description: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

name: ジジーロン
description: The mountains it calls home are nearly two miles in height. On rare occasions, it descends to play with the children living in the towns below.
move1description: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

name: イーブイ
description: Its ability to evolve into many forms allows it to adapt smoothly and perfectly to any environment.
move1description: Draw a card.

name: イーブイ ex
abilityDescription: This Pokémon can evolve into any Pokémon that evolves from Eevee if you play it from your hand onto this Pokémon.(This Pokémon can't evolve during your first turn or the turn you play it.)

name: カビゴン ex
abilityDescription: At the end of your turn, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, heal 20 damage from it.
move1description: This Pokémon is now Asleep.

name: エイパム
description: As it did more and more with its tail, its hands became clumsy. It makes its nest high in the treetops.
move1description: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.

name: エテボース
description: It uses its tails for everything. If it wraps both of its tails around you and gives you a squeeze, that’s proof it really likes you.
abilityDescription: Once during your turn, you may put a random Pokémon Tool card from your deck into your hand.

name: ペラップ
description: It mimics the cries of other Pokémon to trick them into thinking it’s one of them. This way they won’t attack it.
move1description: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

name: タブンネ
description: This Pokémon has a kind heart. By touching with its feelers, Audino can gauge other creatures’ feelings and physical conditions.
move1description: This attack does 20 damage for each of your Benched Pokémon.

name: チラーミィ
description: The way it brushes away grime with its tail can be helpful when cleaning. But its focus on spotlessness can make cleaning more of a hassle.

name: チラチーノ
description: Its body secretes oil that this Pokémon spreads over its nest as a coating to protect it from dust. Cinccino won’t tolerate even a speck of the stuff.

name: ホシガリス
description: It stores berries in its cheeks. When there are no berries to be found, Skwovet will stuff pebbles into its cheeks to stave off its cravings.

name: ヨクバリス
description: This Pokémon makes off with heaps of fallen berries by wrapping them in its tail, which is roughly twice the length of its body.
move1description: If this Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool attached, this attack does 50 more damage.

name: イーブイのバッグ
description: Choose 1:① During this turn, attacks used by your Pokémon that evolve from Eevee do +10 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.② Heal 20 damage from each of your Pokémon that evolves from Eevee.

name: たべのこし
description: At the end of your turn, if the Pokémon this card is attached to is in the Active Spot, heal 10 damage from that Pokémon.

name: ハウ
description: During this turn, attacks used by your Decidueye ex, Incineroar ex, or Primarina ex do +30 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: ボタン
description: Look at a random Supporter card that's not Penny from your opponent's deck and shuffle it back into their deck. Use the effect of that card as the effect of this card.

name: リーフィア
description: When you see Leafeon asleep in a patch of sunshine, you’ll know it is using photosynthesis to produce clean air.
move1description: This attack does 20 more damage for each[G]Energy attached to this Pokémon.

description: Inhaled air is carried to its flame sac, heated, and exhaled as fire that reaches over 3,000 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: イーブイ ex

name: カイロス
description: These Pokémon judge one another based on pincers. Thicker, more impressive pincers make for more popularity with the opposite gender.
move1description: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 40 more damage for each heads.

name: ラプラス
description: A smart and kindhearted Pokémon, it glides across the surface of the sea while its beautiful song echoes around it.
move1description: If this Pokémon has at least 3 extra[W]Energy attached, this attack does 70 more damage.

name: ビリリダマ
description: It rolls to move. If the ground is uneven, a sudden jolt from hitting a bump can cause it to explode.
move1description: This Pokémon also does 10 damage to itself.

name: マルマイン
description: The more energy it charges up, the faster it gets. But this also makes it more likely to explode.

name: ラルトス
description: The horns on its head provide a strong power that enables it to sense people’s emotions.
move1description: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

name: キルリア
description: It has a psychic power that enables it to distort the space around it and see into the future.

name: サーナイト
description: To protect its Trainer, it will expend all its psychic power to create a small black hole.
abilityDescription: Once during your turn, you may take a[P]Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to the[P]Pokémon in the Active Spot.

name: アーボ
description: By dislocating its jaw, it can swallow prey larger than itself. After a meal, it curls up and rests.

name: アーボック
description: The latest research has determined that there are over 20 possible arrangements of the patterns on its stomach.
move1description: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.

name: カモネギ
description: The stalk this Pokémon carries in its wings serves as a sword to cut down opponents. In a dire situation, the stalk can also serve as food.

name: ファイヤー ex
move1description: Flip 3 coins. Take an amount of[R]Energy from your Energy Zone equal to the number of heads and attach it to your Benched[R]Pokémon in any way you like.

name: フリーザー ex
move2description: This attack also does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: サンダー ex
move2description: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 50 damage for each heads.

name: エルレイド ex
move1description: This attack does 20 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: イーブイのバッグ
description: Choose 1:① During this turn, attacks used by your Pokémon that evolve from Eevee do +10 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.② Heal 20 damage from each of your Pokémon that evolves from Eevee.
